agency.subtitle: LEARN FROM US
agency.title: AGENCY
agency.description: 📈 We take care of everything: campaigns, content, social media, and strategy. You focus on your business, we'll help it grow.

courses.subtitle: LEARN WITH US.
courses.title: COURSES
courses.description: 🎓 Learn how to manage your brand, attract customers, and scale your business. We'll teach you what we do every day, no strings attached.

faq.title: YOU HAVE THE QUESTIONS, WE HAVE THE ANSWERS.
faq.subtitle: 👉 Everything you wanted to know (and no one explained well)
faq.ctaSubtitle: We are ready to resolve all your doubts

resultsTime.question: How long does it take to see results?
resultsTime.answer: The first results begin to appear between weeks 2 and 4. More solid results (such as increased sales, leads, or consistent visibility) typically appear between 3 and 6 months. Still, it all depends on your industry, your competition, and your starting point.

investment.question: What is the investment required to get started?
investment.answer: We work with plans tailored to different budgets, from entrepreneurs to large companies. The price depends on your needs (strategy, execution, schedule). We provide you with a personalized proposal after understanding your goals.

whatMakesDifferent.question: What makes us different from other agencies?
whatMakesDifferent.answer: 👉 We teach you how to fish. We don't want you to depend on us. We explain everything so you can make better decisions, with or without Iupendi. We truly immerse ourselves in your brand: we speak like your audience, think with you, and harness creativity with strategy to achieve real (and measurable) results. We're very passionate... or as some people say, intense. But it's in your best interest 😉.

servicesIncluded.question: What exactly do your services include?
servicesIncluded.answer: 👉 It depends on the plan you choose, but we can handle everything. From strategy to execution, so you have a brand that's seen, understood, and sells. Some of the services we offer: Personalized digital strategy, Social media management and content creation, Advertising campaigns (Meta, Google, and more), Web development, Email marketing and automation, Clear reports, and meetings to adjust and scale. 💬 Want something specific? We also create custom packages.

supportCommunication.question: How does communication and support work?
supportCommunication.answer: 👉 You'll always speak with real people, not bots or endless tickets. You have an assigned team, regular meetings, constant follow-up, and clear reports. We respond quickly, straightforwardly, and with a good vibe. 💬 We're on top of things (yes, intense again 😅), but because we care.
